item.title: Custom keyboard shortcuts for Evolution in GNOME
item.description: I’ve been a big fan of Thunderbird for years, but it lacks features in some critical areas. For example, I need Microsoft Exchange and Google Apps connectivity for my mail and contacts, but Thunderbird needs some extensions to make that connectivity easier. There are some great extensions available, but they lack polish since they’re not part of the core product. My muscle memory for keyboard shortcuts in Thunderbird left me fumbling in Evolution.
